member.name: F:CarTrade.Menus.players
member.summary: Holds all players in the game as list of class player

member.name: F:CarTrade.Menus.currentPlayer
member.summary: Hold player object for current move switches between players available in players

member.name: M:CarTrade.Menus.AddPlayers(System.Collections.Generic.List{CarTrade.Player})
member.summary: Adds List of players to Menus class as availability to work on this data during game itself
member.param: The list is provided to add possibility for game to go through players

member.name: M:CarTrade.Menus.StartGame
member.summary: Collects all needed information about the game, as difficulty, amount of players and nicks of players
member.returns: List of with all player names difficulty and amount of players in it
